website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Mix Master Move 2 is a lightweight shoe that gained positive feedback from several users. They admire the shoe's protective and comfortable design. The shoe also offers a combination of cushioning and impressive ground feel. The Mix Master Move 2 is trail running shoe for tempo runs, daily training, and racing.
pros: Most runners appreciate the lightweight construction of the Mix Master Move 2
This shoe is very comfortable based on some reviews
It features reflective details for increase visibility
The Merrell Mix Master Move 2 has a protective toe cap for added protection while running on rough terrains
The heel has an air cushion for shock absorption and added stability
It comes with a removable foot bed for orthotics
cons: Some runners found this shoe too narrow for them
The new designed made some runners disappointed based on some reviews

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for Merrell
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I've purchased because they're very comfortable. But both pairs started to breakdown with defects prematurely. This latest pair the sole started pulling away after 2 months of normal wear. The previous pair the sticking came undone after 3 months of normal wear. Neither time was I within the return window. WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Max

customer_reviews.title: good quality but careful with sizing and if you prefer minimalist shoes, look somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were at least a size too small for me. Good quality, not sure about the sole not lasting issues as I passed them on to somebody in the family. I like merrell gear but the changes they made in the last few years iterations are not that great - thicker soles, more arch support and size variability. I first started using merrell as they had some of the best minimalist shoes but it seems they are going the asics way now.
customer_reviews.author: Macaccus Rhesus

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: A solid trail shoe. No rock plate so you feel it if the trail is too rocky. Not a lot of cushion so if you need that look for a different shoe. It felt stiff to me out of the box, and I like flex, but running in them they are not stiff at all. Toe box has ample room for me. I normally wear a 10.5 but got the 11. I wear an 11 in Saucony. This fits a little bigger than the Sauconys I wear. Overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGann

customer_reviews.title: Order A Size Larger To Be Safe
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14, but I had to order these one size larger in order to fit properly. I wouldn't say that these shoes have a decent arch support, but I wear orthopedic inserts for my arches anyway, so it doesn't really concern me. The toe box is larger than typical running shoes; that's another reason I bought them. Also because they are very brightly colored. People will take note and comment that I'm a really cool looking clown.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Not too minimal, good on mix of road and trails
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, I put about 3-5 miles on pavement and trails every other day with these for past couple months and they are holding up well. I took out the inner sole padding and got a perfect fit on my slightly Fred Flintstone-esque feet. Nice slightly-more-than-minimalistic design that works for me very well especially over rocks and roots. I definitely would recommend if you are looking for something that is lower profile and lighter weight than the typical running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Generic Dude

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a slipper.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love them, this is my second pair. They have lasted 2 years so far and are only just showing signs of wear on the upper, and have about a third of the sole left at its most worn point. It is a shame that I can't find them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: rorschach

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Since I discovered Merrell about 2 and a half years ago I stopped buying other brands of sport shoes. The shoes fit like you are wearing nothing at all. They are lightweight, I don't notice them on my feet, and remain comfortable all day long. I admit I am not a runner or jogger, so I can't rate them for that, but for everyday walking they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Merrell sizing and quality have gone downhill!
customer_reviews.text: Merrell has really gone downhill in the last couple of years. I used to be able to buy almost any Merrell without trying them on. Three years ago I bought 4 pair of Merrell minimal shoes and wore the soles off! In this last week, I bought 2 different pairs and both are terrible. One had a really high arch, this Mix Master Move 2 is so narrow, they hurt my toes and I've only had them on 10 minutes. Going back tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes for walking around all day
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes for walking around all day. Only gripe is that a shovel dug a hole straight through them when I was digging, but I do a lot of digging and that is not their intended purpose for these shoes. If you want something minimalist that you can walk around in all day then this is the shoe for you!
customer_reviews.author: The Inquisitor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but.....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this shoe. It offered great performance but the sole came unglued a week after having them. I'm no way was this a reflection of the shipper or Merrill. Shipping was fast and Merrill is a great product. I think I just got a lemon. Refund was fast and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: amanda mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: First pair of running shoes i bought in a loooooong time. Actually the only pair of "running" shoes I've ever bought specifically for running. I run these shoes weekly on paved rec trails, outdoor, single track mt. biking trails and even took them in a 30 mile back packing trip through the Ventana Wilderness. 3 words...Love. These. Shoes! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit my feet just right, not too large, not too small. Amazing! I always like the Merrell graphic design. I wanted a dark running type shoe for certain casual days at work, and I wanted something that looked sporty and not bland like a total black tennis shoe would. This Merrell running shoe looked just right, not overstated, not boring.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  S.

customer_reviews.title: Size above works for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet, usually wearing with 12 extra wide or 13 wide. I got the 13's and they're almost perfect. From time to time I'll feel narrowness halfway along my feet, but for not being specifically wide shoes they're roomy but supportive. I'm very pleased. If you're between whole sizes definitely get the size up.
customer_reviews.author: llh

customer_reviews.title: I don't truly think there is a perfect fit for a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I don't truly think there is a perfect fit for a running shoe. With that being said...I won't give it a 5 Star rating. But 4.5 all day longoing. Great fit. Wonderful trail to road rated shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. I have foot problems. I thought I was gonna need more of a shoe, so I bought a pair of Asics and man did the tear my feet up. I returned them and after reading several reviews went with these Merrell's. Love em, they will continue to be my running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Devers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit anything like his old pair of Merrell Mix Master's (the original ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and they were too narrow and seemed to be more built up and cushiony than the previous version of this shoe. Didn't fit anything like his old pair of Merrell Mix Master's (the original ones). We ended up going on eBay and getting the original ones which are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great rock protection
customer_reviews.text: Firm ride, great rock protection, good for times when you want to sacrifice some proprioception for some protection against rocks and roots on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Pisces_Runner-79

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair they are so good. Great traction and very lightweight. After a couple weeks of all day wear exchanging the shoes there is no sign of wear. And I do hike in them, not just sit at a desk.
customer_reviews.author: William Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Wished I could return
customer_reviews.text: Not a true fit, they run small. Unsure if the cut of the shoe is off, but no matter how I tie them I can't keep the tongue from sliding down the side. If I hadn't already tossed the box I'd return them.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: I can't honestly say they provide good arch support because I only wore them around the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't honestly say they provide good arch support because I only wore them around the house and did not put them to the test yet. They are comfortable and look snazzy. I bought them to wear to my Bronco Games. The color is perfect. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Arney

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light yet has decent support. Not a full blown minimalist shoe but not heavy and bulky like a regular sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Merrell: Keep making these 4mm drop
customer_reviews.text: Note: I am using them with the Spenco Polysorb walker/runner insole. They fit superb, they grip beautiful and the best part is that running in them is an effortless task.
customer_reviews.author: EnEmGee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected but unfortunately the sole parts of it began to be unglued after few months.
customer_reviews.author: Adp

customer_reviews.title: ... on these shoes and they still look and feel like new.
customer_reviews.text: Have about 50 miles on these shoes and they still look and feel like new.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this type of Merrell shoe. This is my third pair and they did not disappoint. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Grandma F.

customer_reviews.title: ... this same shoe (in men's and woman's sizes) and love them. They are light
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased similar models of this same shoe (in men's and woman's sizes) and love them. They are light, comfortable and supportive enough to wear for power walking. I walk daily so the sole wears out quicker than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Lisianthus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kick-around shoe. I wear them for everything except what they were designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Habanerousa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe and exactly what I was looking for. Ran a little big, but once I got a half size smaller they were perfect. Durability remains to be seen, only had the new pair for a week.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Very light and airy
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to how light the shoes are...compared to my other Merrell's that feel heavy in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: PA Paul

customer_reviews.title: Merrell shoes have been the best buy I ever made
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Merrell trail running shoes for a while, even though I'm not a trail runner. I'm a guy who walks an average of 30,000 steps a day on hard concrete at work and standard athletic shoes with their narrow toe boxes and excess padding were killing my feet. Merrell shoes have been the best buy I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Good trail runners
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for trails, light and comfortable, like a little wider but will see after a little wear.
customer_reviews.author: On the Nose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looking good as it was explained, and the right price.
customer_reviews.author: hyunggeun cho

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wear a ladies 9 1/2 and purchased these in a men's 8. Fit well but have minimum arch support. Great color
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Blake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these Merrell sneakers....great for all day fitness and every other activity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, I run roads with limited trail running. Transitioning from a higher heel to toe drop shoe and have put one seven miler on them. Feels good so far and like the grip. Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Pride

customer_reviews.title: Mix Masters.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Always been a fan of these Mix Masters. The 4mm drop makes them comfortable to wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Merrell provides great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Merrell's Master Move 2 provides great comfort for long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe nut the tongue will fall to the side if you have a high instep.
customer_reviews.author: 480spark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. I use my own custom orthotic arch support from Vinings Spine & Health Center [...] so i can't comment about the arch support, but it is a great look and fit! very happy
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Aaron Bailey

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect. These are big
customer_reviews.text: I have the same pair in black. They fit perfect. These are big.
customer_reviews.author: Mivimo

customer_reviews.title: Merrell's Again
customer_reviews.text: Husband hasn't worn yet, but liked his old pair, hoping he will be as satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: These run narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, but they're narrower than other size 10 merrel's Ive had before. So I returned them and want to get the next size larger or find the same size ten in a wide version.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fred Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Merrell shoes and these were a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: sarah roark

customer_reviews.title: Great all around trail shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these fit and the extra padding for days I'm running heavy footed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wunderlich

customer_reviews.title: Upper may be too high around ankle bones
customer_reviews.text: The upper was painfully to high around my ankle. The rest of the shoe felt good and performed well, but I had to return since it looked like a break in period was not going to help both the inside and outside ankle bones and the hot spots the shoe produced. The zero drop Bare Access Ultra's did not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and the plus is they are lightweight and have perfect ventilation for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: ryemyster

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Size
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 & 1/2 but it was too tight...probably from being too narrow...went to a 9 and it works better...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moody

customer_reviews.title: ... they are a bit large they are so very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: though they are a bit large they are so very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Sturm

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoe I have ever ownef
customer_reviews.text: These are the lightest, most comfortable shoe I have ever ownef.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair Merrell Mix Master shoes. They are so comfortable. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very light, well-fitted. All I expected from a Merrell shoe. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So far it's fitting perfect will see if it breaks in quickly
customer_reviews.text: So far it's fitting perfect will see if it breaks in quickly .... it's my first Merrill tennis shoes so giving it a try
customer_reviews.author: omar Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best show ever,needed knee surgery,started using mix masters 2 yrs ago, relieved my knee pain ,stalled my surgery,
customer_reviews.author: ray mazzilli

customer_reviews.title: get a 13 in these and you'll be good to go
customer_reviews.text: If you normally where a 13, get a 13 in these and you'll be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I cannot wait to hit the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L Kelley

customer_reviews.title: good travel shoes
customer_reviews.text: good travel shoes, light weight, held up to short hikes and cobble stones in Europe. While they are not as comfortable and supportive as a small hiking shoe they are close, and if weight is an issue they are a good compromise.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to complain about. Not for very rough terrain ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Not for very rough terrain but does the job otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Krealestate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, I just wish they offered more options in the larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all the way around. Fits as all Merrill products to
customer_reviews.author: Lori McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable and sexy
customer_reviews.text: You'll never regret buying those shoes, extremely comfortable and sexy. You can wear them for running, working-out or going to school or work. Good buy but a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: amz-customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs short, marrow and high on heels
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking but is too short, too narrow but above all too high on the heels, hurting heel bones. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great and feels light as a feather!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels light as a feather. I hope it works well for the Spartan Obsticle Race I'm running in June!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tow

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit true and vent well
customer_reviews.text: These are very light shoes and I'm using them strictly for running. Very comfortable, fit true and vent well. The cushioning is a little thinner than some other Merrells that I've had and I can feel small rocks and road irregularities more frequently, but there is less strain on my calves and shins with difference in weight from a traditional trail shoe. My 3rd pair of Merrells and I'm sold on em!
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was gift to my son-in-law that was too small and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: tn1

customer_reviews.title: Off- gassing stench.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are light, fit well but the shoes have an off-gassing chemical stench which makes me wonder about the toxicity of the synthetic materials. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Manfish

customer_reviews.title: Love my Merrells Mix Master Move 2
customer_reviews.text: Love my Merrells Mix Master Move 2. Best fitting Merrells for me so far as well as the bare foot glove. Even with my wide feet it fits well, true to size and great balance especially if you replace the insoles with Dr Scholls. My second pair after my old blue ones which are beginning to dry our after 3 years. Great for long walks and regular wear and breaking into barefoot Merrells. Maybe i will be greedy and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: chuck wagon

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's MIX MASTER MOVE 2 Trail Running Shoes, Blue (BLUE / GREEN), 40
